item.title: Few Voters Say Trump’s Second Term Has Made the Country Better, Poll Finds

item.title: Dallas Exonerates Black Man Who Was Wrongfully Executed in 1956
item.description:
An all-white jury convicted Tommy Lee Walker of rape and murder, relying on inadmissible evidence and a coerced confession that he immediately recanted, county officials said.

]]>
